summary: An examination of the genocide in Sudan's western region of Darfur.
cast: Ahmed Mahammed Abaka|Sheikh Ahmed Mohamad Abakar|Hawa Abaker|Hejewa Adam|Kalatumh Adam|Xabier Aguirre|Sam Brownback|Don Cheadle|Hillary Clinton|George Clooney|Adam Cygman|Essa Faal|Vanessa Haas|Nimeri Issa|Asha Abdal Khaleeq|Béatrice Le Fraper du Hellen|John McCain|Jason Miller|Abdalmahmood Abdalhaleem Mohamad|Luis Moreno-Ocampo|Adebowale Omofade|John Prendergast|Pablo Recalde|Hawa Saleman|Arnold Schwarzenegger|Musa Sharif|Dana Sterling|Wayne Sterling|James Sweeney|Jennifer Trone
title: Darfur Now
